snippet: In seeking re-election, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has announced few big ideas for the next four years, saying he is running on his record. An opponent says he has an “imperialistic attitude.”
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, seeking a second term, has offered few big ideas for the next four years but promises there will be 'significant' policy proposals in the near future; Cuomo still has wide lead over his Republican rival Rob Astorino.
lead_paragraph: In seeking re-election, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has announced few big ideas for the next four years, saying he is running on his record. An opponent says he has an “imperialistic attitude.”

headline.main: Cuomo Pledges ‘Progress’ in a Second Term, With the Details Still to Come
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Pledges ‘Progress’ in a Second Term, With the Details Still to Come

keywords.value: New York Public Interest Research Group
